04 Nov 2019, 22:27 by siti fatimah



Aspek Keselamatan Bandara Adi Sumarmo Solo Dievaluasi



Aspek Keselamatan Bandara Adi Sumarmo Solo Dievaluasi


KBRN, Surakarta: PT Angkasa Pura I Persero Cabang Bandara Internasional Adi Sumarmo Solo terus melakukan upaya agar menjadi bandara terbaik. Salah satunya dengan melakukan evaluasi terhadap aspek keselamatan bandara Airport Safety Review menggandeng Airports Council International ACI menggelar Acara Airport Excellent (APEX).Direktur Operasional PT Angkasa Pura I Persero Wendo Asrul Rose mengungkapkan, keselamatan merupakan prisnsip mutlak dalam sektor penerbangan yang harus senantiasa di jaga dan ditingkatkan kualitasnya. Selain itu aspek keamanan pelayannan dan kepatuhan. "Kegiatan evaluasi keselamatan bandara merupakan inisiatif Angkasa Pura I dengan berpartisipasi pada program Apex in Safety yang diinisiasi oleh ACI.  Ini merupakan organisasi dunia terkait penyediaan informasi dan kebijakan yang dianjurkan untuk bandar udara serta membantu mengembangkan standart bandara," ujar Wendo Asrul Rose dalam siaran persnya, Senin (4/11/2019).Bandara Adi Sumarmo merupakan bandara ke 6  yang dinilai dan dievaluasi oleh ACI terkait tingkat keselamatan penerbangan berdasarkan standart yang ditetapkan oleh International Civil Aviation organization ICAO di bandara Internasional Adi Sumarmo Solo. Kegiatan APEX in safety nanti akan memberikan rekomendasi sebagai bentuk hasil review yang dilakukan."Kegiatan ini tidak mencari kesempurnaan tapi justru ingin melihat apa yang masih menjadi kekurangan," sambungnya.Wendo Asrul mengatakan, pada kegiatan ini tim auditor dari ACI terdiri dari management bandara Internasional dari berbagai Negara di Dunia. Member ACI sendiri mencapai 200 Airport di Dunia. Sementara Tim ACI yang melakukan Apex in safety di bandara Adi sumarmo Solo ada 5 negara diantaranya Juan manuel Manriquez Vinas selaku safety manager APEX Programe Muhammad Ali  Aman bait Jamil Selaku Airport Deputy manager Oman Airport management Company. "5 bandara di bawah management PT AP I juga telah dievaluasi ACI  yakni abandara Internasional I Gusti Ngurah Rai Bali, Bandara Internasional Sepinggan Balikpapan, Juanda Surabaya, Sultan Hasanudin Makasar dan Bandara Internasional Jenderal Ahmad Yani Semarang."

The Safety Aspects of the Adi Sumarmo Solo Airport are Evaluated
Nov 04 2019, 22:27 by siti fatimah



The Safety Aspects of the Adi Sumarmo Solo Airport are Evaluated



The Safety Aspects of the Adi Sumarmo Solo Airport are Evaluated


KBRN, Surakarta: PT Angkasa Pura I Persero Branch of the Adi Sumarmo International Airport Solo continues to make efforts to become the best airport. One of them is by evaluating the airport safety aspects of the Airport Safety Review in cooperation with the International Airport Council ACI held an Excellent Airport Event (APEX). Operational Director of PT Angkasa Pura I Persero Wendo Asrul Rose revealed, safety is an absolute principle in the aviation sector that must always be maintained and improved quality. In addition, the security aspects of service and compliance. "The airport safety evaluation activity is an initiative of Angkasa Pura I by participating in the Apex in Safety program initiated by ACI. This is a world organization related to providing information and policies recommended for airports and helping to develop airport standards," said Wendo Asrul Rose in his press release , Monday (11/04/2019). Adi Sumarmo Airport is the 6th airport that is assessed and evaluated by ACI regarding the level of flight safety based on standards set by the ICAO International Civil Aviation organization at the Adi Sumarmo Solo International airport. The APEX in safety activity will provide recommendations as a form of review results. "This activity is not looking for perfection but instead wants to see what is still lacking," he continued. Wendo Asrul said, in this activity the auditor team from ACI consisted of international airport management from various countries in the world. ACI members alone reach 200 airports in the world. While the ACI Team conducting Apex in safety at Adi Sumarmo Airport in Solo there are 5 countries including Juan Manriquez Vinas as the safety manager of APEX Program Muhammad Ali Safe bait Jamil as the Airport Deputy manager of Oman Airport Management Company. "5 airports under the management of PT AP I have also been evaluated by ACI, namely I Gusti Ngurah Rai International Abandon Bali, Balikpapan Sepinggan International Airport, Juanda Surabaya, Sultan Hasanudin Makassar and General Ahmad Yani International Airport Semarang."
